targets.query: SELECT max("count_total") - last("count_total") FROM "elasticsearch_clusterstats_nodes" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("count_total") FROM "elasticsearch_clusterstats_nodes" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
node_stats.node_master:true

SELECT  (last("data_0_total_in_bytes") - last("data_0_free_in_bytes")) / last("data_0_total_in_bytes") * 100  FROM "elasticsearch_fs" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
type:node_stats
type:node_stats
type:node_stats
type:node_stats
type:node_stats

SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("indexing_index_time_in_millis"), $__interval) FROM "elasticsearch_indices" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null) offset 1

SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("gc_collectors_old_collection_count"), 1s) FROM "elasticsearch_jvm" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous) offset 1

SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("gc_collectors_young_collection_count"), 1s) FROM "elasticsearch_jvm" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous) offset 1

SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("fielddata_memory_size_in_bytes"), $__interval) FROM "elasticsearch_indices" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null) offset 1

SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("query_cache_total_count"), 1s) FROM "elasticsearch_clusterstats_indices" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null) offset 1

SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("query_cache_hit_count"), 1s) FROM "elasticsearch_clusterstats_indices" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null) offset 1

SELECT non_negative_derivative(sum("query_cache_miss_count"), 1s) FROM "elasticsearch_clusterstats_indices" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null) offset 1

SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("merges_total_time_in_millis"), 1s) FROM "elasticsearch_indices" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null) offset 1

SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("get_time_in_millis"), $__interval) FROM "elasticsearch_indices" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null) offset 1

SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("search_query_total"), 1s) FROM "elasticsearch_indices" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null) offset 1
SELECT max("merges_current") FROM "elasticsearch_indices" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null) offset 1
